name: Rulent Tower VR
description:
Thanks for trying out the latest dimension in Game Boy games!

Look around, use the Triggers to teleport or pick up objects, and immerse yourself in your new blocky reality!

Also, there are definitely no bugs!

There are two versions included. One intended for PC, the other built specifically for Oculus Quest. You'll need to sideload the APK for the Quest, but there's an easy-to-follow tutorial linked in the Readme if you've never done that before.

I want to thank my Patrons and other awesome supporters who make this stuff possible, including:

Sofox, SuperKing, Jessica Bumpus, MaskRider, A Kitty, Matt Schock, Jeffrey Perigo, and braedon benson

If you want to support me, you can check out my Patreon at https://www.patreon.com/setsune , or buy me a coffee at https://ko-fi.com/setsune if you enjoyed this.

Thanks for Playing, and Happy April Fools!
